title: Team Rocket Counters

meta.description: Find Pokemon Go Team Rocket counters. Get the 30 best counters with the world's #1 custom Team Rocket counter guide.

intro: Team Rocket has invaded Pokemon Go and Pokebattler is here to help you fight them off! Battles are 3v3 with you facing your 3 Pokemon off against Team Rocket's boosted Pokemon. These battles can be extremely challenging so make sure you prepare before you challenge them!

breakingNews.title: Breaking News
breakingNews.subtitle: Team Rocket Invasions In Pokemon Go

articles.title: Latest Team Rocket News!
articles.subtitle: Articles and Videos About Team Rocket From Top Players And Researchers

note.default: Team Rocket Grunts are not very difficult as they do not shield. Team Rocket Executives and Giovanni have higher stats and will shield the first two specials used. Resisting the quick attack and using Pokemon that can force the shadow Pokemon to use their shields is the best way to beat these tough foes!
note.loggedIn: Note: Please make sure your trainer level is correctly set. Research is still on going as to the exact mechanics of Team Rocket Pokemon but player level is a factor. Team Rocket Pokemon are no longer as powerful as they once were, make sure to check your custom counters again

RAID_LEVEL_1.title: Rocket Tier 1
RAID_LEVEL_1.subtitle: Common Shadow Battles
RAID_LEVEL_1.intro: Rocket Tier 1 battles are easier and should be beatable by anyone using appropriate counters. These battles are against boosted level 27 Pokemon for level 40 players. Lower level players will face easier Pokemon

You can also use this section for analysis of what would happen if you had a legendary Shadow Squirtle Team Rocket invasion too!

CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.title: Executive Cliff
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Leader
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro: My strength comes from my loyalty to Team GO Rocket.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro2: I will do anything and everything for Team GO Rocket.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro3: I owe the boss my life. I’d do anything for him.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro4: Team GO Rocket saved me. It’s time to return the favor!
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro5: Add my name to your list of weaknesses.

CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.title: Executive Sierra
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Leader
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro: I envy you—you get to battle me!
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro2: This will be a battle I’m sure you’ll never forget.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro3: You already know this, but you don’t stand a chance.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro4: You can’t possibly match my skill, dear.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro5: I do hope you like the taste of failure!

CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.title: Executive Arlo
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Leader
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.intro: It’s time to learn your place in the world.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.intro3: Prepare yourself for a world of hurt.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.intro5: Your defeat comes on swift wings.

CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.title: Giovanni
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.subtitle: The Boss
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro: I will not tolerate your interference.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro2: You cannot stop me...but I’m amused by your attempt.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro3: Your professor has not prepared you for what is to come.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro4: You’ve made it this far. Let me see just how strong you are.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro5: You will never defeat Team GO Rocket.

CHARACTER_FIGHTING_GRUNT_FEMALE.title: Fighting Grunt ♀
CHARACTER_FIGHTING_GRUNT_FEMALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket
CHARACTER_FIGHTING_GRUNT_FEMALE.intro: This buff physique isn't just for show!

CHARACTER_GROUND_GRUNT_MALE.title: Ground Grunt ♂
CHARACTER_GROUND_GRUNT_MALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket
CHARACTER_GROUND_GRUNT_MALE.intro: You'll be defeated into the ground

CHARACTER_GHOST_GRUNT_MALE.title: Ghost Grunt ♂
CHARACTER_GHOST_GRUNT_MALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket
CHARACTER_GHOST_GRUNT_MALE.intro: Ke... ke... ke... ke... ke... ke!

CHARACTER_FIRE_GRUNT_FEMALE.title: Fire Grunt ♀
CHARACTER_FIRE_GRUNT_FEMALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket
CHARACTER_FIRE_GRUNT_FEMALE.intro: Do you know how hot Pokemon fire breath can get?

CHARACTER_PSYCHIC_GRUNT_MALE.title: Psychic Grunt ♂
CHARACTER_PSYCHIC_GRUNT_MALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket
CHARACTER_PSYCHIC_GRUNT_MALE.intro: Are you scared of psychics that use unseen power?

CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_MALE.title: Decoy Grunt ♂
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_MALE.subtitle: Boss Decoy
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_MALE.intro2: I can’t believe you fell for it!
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_MALE.intro3: In the name of the boss, I’ll destroy you!
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_MALE.intro5: It feels good to see you disappointed.

CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_FEMALE.title: Decoy Grunt ♀
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_FEMALE.subtitle: Boss Decoy
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_FEMALE.intro2: I can’t believe you fell for it!
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_FEMALE.intro3: In the name of the boss, I’ll destroy you!
CHARACTER_DECOY_GRUNT_FEMALE.intro5: It feels good to see you disappointed.

executives.title: Team Rocket Leaders
executives.description: Team Rocket leaders feature more difficult fights including shielding! Make sure you are prepared for all Team Rocket has in store for you!

grunts.title: Team Rocket Grunts
grunts.description: Team Rocket grunts are easier fights with no shields.

results.title: {{defender}} Counters

meta.description: The best Team Rocket {{defender}} Counters with configurable levels and shielding

counters.title: counters
counters.subtitle: Best Attackers by
counters.description: The following analysis shows the Pokemon that are the strongest counters in terms of {{sort}} against {{pokemon}}.
counters.moveSetOrderingDescription: The move sets are ordered from hardest to battle against to the easiest, make sure to check multiple, the results can vary greatly!
counters.difficultyNote: Team Rocket Invasion Shadow Pokemon are much harder than a normal battle, you should consider carefully your options.

hardestMovesets.title: Most Difficult Battles
hardestMovesets.subtitle: For {{pokemon}} by {{sort}}
hardestMovesets.description: Team Rocket Battle difficulty can vary greatly based on the moveset of the defending pokemon!

analysis.title: About This Analysis
analysis.description: This Team Rocket Battle analysis was based off simulating combat with a defending {{defender.pokemon}} with {{defender.cp}} CP and {{attackers}}. The simulation was run with a Team Rocket Invasion simulator. {{numSims}} simulations were performed with each possible moveset of {{defender.pokemon}} simulated against every single Pokemon with every possible moveset. The best 30 attackers with their best moveset based on {{sort}} were kept and are displayed here.

attackers.pokebox: the custom Pokemon from user #{{userId}}'s pokebox

results.description: Welcome to the Pokebattler Team Rocket counters guide for {{pokemon}}. You can find the best counters based on the moveset of each shadow Pokemon. This guide is customizable in several different ways. You can log in and enter your Pokemon into your Pokebox for the highest accuracy result as view these general results using various sort options.

patreon.description: More accurate results for unknown movesets provided thanks to the support of subscribers. Subscribers receive additional pokebox space, even higher accuracy results for all movesets and more.
patreon.link: See all the benefits you get for signing up
